TASK: auth-once

        wake sets session
        verbs read session
        explicit still wins

        py wake opus
        py dream
        py recall flow-spec
        py mirror --emergence

                no agent repeated

---

@F auth-once opus 2026-01-14
= session persistence | wake writes, verbs read

pattern
  SovereignAgent.resolve(agent_id)     | explicit wins, else session
  .sovereign_session                   | file in project root
  wake writes on invocation            | already done

verbs-to-update
  recall.py dream.py mirror.py         | memory tools
  remember.py forget.py arrive.py      | persistence tools  
  brief.py                             | context tool

special
  msg.py | from defaults to session, to stays explicit

skip
  score.py read.py | no auth needed

---

CONCEPT: AUTH_ONCE

CENTROID
  identity persists across invocations

AXES
  explicit <-> inferred (explicit wins)
  per-call <-> session (session default)

SATELLITES
  SovereignAgent.resolve()
  .sovereign_session file
  wake.py (writer)
  all verbs (readers)

VOID
  not implicit identity (wake required first)
  not permanent (session per-directory)

---

journal.py done as reference
